alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:29PM CDT until July 21 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Frontier County in southwestern Nebraska... Southeastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT/815 PM MDT/. * At 829 PM CDT/729 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Hayes Center to 15 miles northeast of Wauneta to 7 miles north of Enders to Champion to 7 miles south of Lamar, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Imperial, Hayes Center, Wauneta, Enders, Enders Reservoir State Recreation Area, Champion, Hamlet, Quick, Center Dam Campground, Willow View Campground, Hayes Center State Wildlife Management Area, Area A Campground, Bluegill Haven Campground, Red Willow Reservoir State Recreation Area and Church Grove Campground. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 25 and 30. Highway 83 between mile markers 27 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
